dcterms:creator: A. Rasouli
I. Kotseruba
J. K. Tsotsos
dcterms:description: JAAD is a dataset for studying joint attention in the context of autonomous driving, focusing on pedestrian and driver behaviors at the point of crossing and the factors that affect them. It provides a collection of annotated short video clips representing typical urban driving scenarios under various weather conditions.
dcterms:title: JAAD
